TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit NumericPagerField extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField

summary.span: 表示一个 字段，该字段可使用户按页码选择页。

span.span: Represents a field that enables users to select a page by page number.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类显示中的导航控件控件。The class displays navigation controls in a control. 可以使用的控件实现的控件显示的数据进行分页到接口，如控件。The controls can be used to page through data that is displayed by a control that implements the interface, such as the control. 对象可显示页码为用户单击页码即可转到特定页的按钮。The object displays page numbers as buttons that users can click to move to specific a page. 该控件还显示使用户能够访问由控件显示比更多页数据的下一页和上一页按钮。The control also displays next-page and previous-page buttons that enable users to access more pages of data than the ones that are displayed by the control. 你可以自定义的外观通过使用下表中列出的属性的对象。You can customize the appearance of the object by using the properties that are listed in the following table. |PropertyProperty|描述Description| |--------------|-----------------| ||当前页码 CSS 类。The CSS class for the current page number.| ||下一页和上一页按钮 CSS 类。The CSS class for the next-page and previous-page buttons.| ||表示页码的按钮，CSS 类。The CSS class for the buttons that represent the page numbers.| 你可以使用属性以选择将显示的按钮的类型。You can use the property to select the type of button that will be displayed. 下表列出了可用的按钮类型。The following table lists the available button types. |按钮类型Button type|描述Description| |-----------------|-----------------| ||一个 控件。A control.| ||一个 控件。An control.| ||一个 控件。A control.| 在控件对象呈现与它们之间的非换行空格。The controls inside the object are rendered with non-breaking spaces between them. 如果你想要自定义此行为，则可以使用属性。If you want to customize this behavior, you can use the property. 可以隐藏对象在通过设置属性`false`。You can hide a object in a control by setting the property to `false`. 你无法控制的可见性的下一页和上一页按钮。You cannot control the visibility of the next-page and previous-page buttons. 如果关联的数据控件具有可用于显示其他页，它们将显示由控件。They are displayed by the control if the associated data control has additional pages available to display. 你可以使用属性指定多少按钮显示在对象。You can use the property to specify how many buttons are displayed in a object. 每个按钮对应于页号。Each button corresponds to a page number. 通过设置可以设置下一步按钮的文本属性。You can set the text of the next-page button by setting the property. 你可以通过使用设置上一页按钮的文本属性。You can set the text of the previous-page button by using the property. 当属性设置为，你必须提供将显示图像的 URL 的下一页和上一页按钮。When the property is set to , you must provide the URL of an image that will be displayed for the next-page and previous page buttons. 执行此操作通过设置和属性。You do this by setting the and properties. 在这种情况下，对应的文本属性作为备用文本使用的映像。In that case, the corresponding text property is used as the alternate text for the image. 例如，通过指定的文本属性显示为下一步页图像按钮的替换文字。For example, the text that is specified by the property is displayed as the alternate text for the next-page image button. 在支持工具提示的浏览器，此文本也显示为相应的按钮的工具提示。On browsers that support tooltips, this text is also displayed as a tooltip for the corresponding button. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用对象中显示的数据进行分页控件。The following example shows how to use a object to page through data that is displayed in a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField/CS/NumericPagerFieldCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField/VB/NumericPagerFieldVB.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数通常用于将字段添加到动态创建控件。This constructor is typically used when you add fields to a dynamically created control. 若要添加动态对象控制，请新建一个对象、 设置其属性，并将其添加到的字段集合控件。To add a object dynamically to a control, create a new object, set its properties, and then add it to the field collection for the control. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用此构造函数中动态添加对象传递给控件。The following example shows how to use the constructor to dynamically add a object to a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField.Ctor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField.Ctor/CS/NumericPagerFieldCtorCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField.Ctor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField.Ctor/VB/NumericPagerFieldCtorVB.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置要在 对象中显示的按钮的数目。

span.span: Gets or sets the number of buttons to display in a object.

value.span: 要在 对象中显示的按钮的数目。

span.span: The number of buttons to display in a object.

value.span: 默认值为 5。

span.span: The default is 5.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来指定要在中显示的按钮数对象。Use the property to specify the number of buttons to display in a object. 每个按钮对应于页号。Each button corresponds to a page number. 如果对象具有页数量超过为指定数量，该控件将显示允许用户访问的页面的下一步集的下一步页按钮。If the object has more pages than the number specified for , the control displays a next-page button that lets users access the next set of pages. 对象显示仅用于现有页码的按钮。The object displays buttons only for existing page numbers. 如果对象有较少的页以显示有关指定的数目，此控件将显示此属性指定的数目更少按钮。If the object has fewer pages to show than the number specified for , the control shows fewer buttons than the number specified by this property. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性可以更改中显示的页按钮的默认数目对象控件。The following example shows how to use the property to change the default number of page buttons that are displayed in the object of a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerFieldCss#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerFieldCss/CS/NumericPagerCssCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerFieldCss#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerFieldCss/VB/NumericPagerCssVB.aspx#1)]

exception.span: 属性被设置为小于 1 的值。

span.span: The property is set to a value less than 1.

span.span: Gets or sets the button type to display in the pager field.

value.span: 值之一。

span.span: One of the values.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出了可用的按钮类型。The following table lists the available button types. |按钮类型值Button type value|描述Description| |-----------------------|-----------------| ||一个 控件。A control.| ||一个 控件。An control.| ||一个 控件。A control.| 当属性设置为，你必须为下一页和上一页按钮提供的图像的 URL。When the property is set to , you must provide the URL of an image for the next-page and previous page buttons. 若要执行此操作，可以使用和属性。To do this, you can use the and properties. 对应的文本属性用作图像的替换文字。The corresponding text property is used as the alternate text for the image. 例如，通过指定的文本属性显示为下一步页图像按钮的替换文字。For example, the text that is specified by the property is displayed as the alternate text for the next-page image button. 在支持工具提示的浏览器，此文本也显示为相应的按钮的工具提示。On browsers that support tooltips, this text is also displayed as a tooltip for the corresponding button. 值属性存储视图状态中。The value of the property is stored in view state. 如果属性不为空字符串或`null`、对象将忽略的值属性。If the property is not an empty string or `null`, the object ignores the value of the property. 在这种情况下，控件用于创建按钮。In that case, the control is used to create the buttons. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性来指定在显示的图像按钮对象控件。The following example shows how to use the property to specify that image buttons are displayed in the object of a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerFieldUrl#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerFieldUrl/CS/NumericPagerUrlCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerFieldUrl#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerFieldUrl/VB/NumericPagerUrlVB.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置用于设置当前页码样式的级联样式表 (CSS) 类。

span.span: Gets or sets the cascading style sheet (CSS) class that is used to style the current page number.

value.span: 用于设置浏览器中当前页码的样式的 CSS 类。

span.span: The CSS class that is used to style the current page number in the browser.

value.span: 默认值为空字符串 ("")，表示尚未设置 属性。

span.span: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that the property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性指定用于样式的 CSS 类对象，表示当前所选的页面数。Use the property to specify the CSS class that is used to style the object that represents the number of the page that is currently selected. 属性始终呈现为`class`属性，而不考虑浏览器。The property is always rendered as a `class` attribute, regardless of the browser. > [!NOTE] > 不支持 CSS，设置浏览器上属性不起作用。On browsers that do not support CSS, setting the property has no effect. 此属性的值存储在视图状态。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何指定 CSS 类设置样式中的当前页码对象控件。The following example shows how to specify a CSS class to style the current page number in the object of a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerFieldCss#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerFieldCss/CS/NumericPagerCssCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerFieldCss#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerFieldCss/VB/NumericPagerCssVB.aspx#1)]

Public Overrides Sub HandleEvent (e As CommandEventArgs)

span.span: The event data.

summary.span: 处理 对象中发生的事件并执行适当的操作。

span.span: Handles events that occur in the object and performs the appropriate action.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是一个帮助器方法。The method is a helper method. 它由方法以处理中发生事件对象的一个按钮在控件内单击时。It is used by the method to handle events that occur in the object when one of the buttons inside the control is clicked. 方法检查属性中包含的对象`e`参数，然后执行相应的措施。The method examines the property of the object that is contained in the `e` parameter, and then performs the appropriate action. 下表列出了由提供的按钮对象和时单击该按钮时执行该操作。The following table lists the buttons provided by the object and the action that is performed when the button is clicked. |ButtonButton|CommandName 值CommandName value|操作Action| |------------|-----------------------|------------| |数字Number|页码Page number|导航到相应的数据页。Navigates to the corresponding page of data.| |前一页Previous page||显示以前的页码集并导航到最后一个在该集中的数据页。Displays the previous set of page numbers and navigates to the last page of data in that set.| |下一页Next page||显示以前的页码集并导航到该集中的数据的第一页。Displays the previous set of page numbers and navigates to the first page of data in that set.|

value.span: 默认值为空字符串 ("")，表示尚未设置 属性。

span.span: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that the property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当属性设置为，使用属性指定为下一步按钮显示图像的 URL。When the property is set to , use the property to specify the URL of an image that is displayed for the next-page button. 图像可以是任何浏览器，如.jpg、.gif、.bmp、 和.png 中支持的文件格式。The image can be in any file format that is supported in browser, such as .jpg, .gif, .bmp, and .png. 当属性设置为值，则设置属性不起作用。When the property is set to a value other than , setting the property has no effect. 此属性的值存储在视图状态。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何显示中的下一页按钮图像对象控件。The following example shows how to display an image for the next-page button in the object of a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerFieldUrl#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerFieldUrl/CS/NumericPagerUrlCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerFieldUrl#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerFieldUrl/VB/NumericPagerUrlVB.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当属性设置为中, 指定的文本属性用作图像的替换文字。When the property is set to , the text specified in the property is used as the alternate text for the image. 在支持工具提示的浏览器，此文本也显示为相应的按钮的工具提示。On browsers that support tooltips, this text is also displayed as a tooltip for the corresponding button. 此属性的值存储在视图状态。The value of this property is stored in view state. 它可以自动保存到的资源文件通过使用设计器工具。It can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 有关详细信息，请参阅和[全球化和本地化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何自定义中的页导航字段的下一页按钮显示的文本控件。The following example shows how to customize the text that is displayed for the next-page button of the pager field in a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerFieldText#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerFieldText/CS/NumericPagerTextCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerFieldText#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerFieldText/VB/NumericPagerTextVB.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下一页和上一页按钮显示通过类以使用户可以访问其他页面的数据页总数大于中指定的值时属性。The next-page and previous-page buttons are displayed by the class to let users access other pages of data when the total number of pages is greater than the value specified in the property. 属性始终呈现为`class`属性，而不考虑浏览器。The property is always rendered as a `class` attribute, regardless of the browser. > [!NOTE] > 不支持 CSS，设置浏览器上属性不起作用。On browsers that do not support CSS, setting the property has no effect. 此属性的值存储在视图状态。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何指定 CSS 类设置样式中的下一页和上一页按钮对象控件。The following example shows how to specify a CSS class to style the next-page and previous-page buttons in the object of a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerFieldCss#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerFieldCss/CS/NumericPagerCssCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerFieldCss#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerFieldCss/VB/NumericPagerCssVB.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个级联样式表 (CSS) 类，用于为页导航字段的页码按钮设置样式。

span.span: Gets or sets the cascading style sheet (CSS) class that is used to style the page-number buttons of the pager field.

value.span: 用于为页导航字段的页码按钮设置样式的 CSS 类。

span.span: The CSS class that is used to style the page-number buttons of the pager field.

value.span: 默认值为空字符串 ("")，表示尚未设置 属性。

span.span: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that the property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 显示页码按钮类以使用户能够直接导航到各个页。Page-number buttons are displayed by the class to enable users to navigate directly to individual pages. 指定的 CSS 类属性应用于通过显示的所有页码对象，但当前选定的页除外。The CSS class specified by the property is applied to all page numbers that are displayed by the object, except for the page that is currently selected. 当前所选的页使用 CSS 类指定属性。The page currently selected page uses the CSS class that is specified by the property. 属性始终呈现为`class`属性，而不考虑浏览器。The property is always rendered as a `class` attribute, regardless of the browser. > [!NOTE] > 不支持 CSS，设置浏览器上属性不起作用。On browsers that do not support CSS, setting the property has no effect. 此属性的值存储在视图状态。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何指定 CSS 类设置样式中的页码按钮对象控件。The following example shows how to specify a CSS class to style the page number buttons in the object of a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerFieldCss#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerFieldCss/CS/NumericPagerCssCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerFieldCss#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerFieldCss/VB/NumericPagerCssVB.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ PreviousPageImageUrl { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置为 对象中的上一页按钮显示的图像的 URL。

span.span: Gets or sets the URL of an image that is displayed for the previous-page button in the object.

value.span: 为 对象中的上一页按钮显示的图像的 URL。

span.span: The URL to an image that is displayed for the previous-page button in the object.

value.span: 默认值为空字符串 ("")，表示尚未设置 属性。

span.span: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that the property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当属性设置为，使用属性指定为上一页按钮显示图像的 URL。When the property is set to , use the property to specify the URL of an image that is displayed for the previous-page button. 图像可以是任何文件格式在浏览器，如.jpg、.gif、.bmp、 和.png 中受支持。The image can be in any file format that is supported in browsers, such as .jpg, .gif, .bmp, and .png. 当属性设置为值，则设置属性不起作用。When the property is set to a value other than , setting the property has no effect. 此属性的值存储在视图状态。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何显示中的前一页按钮图像对象控件。The following example shows how to display an image for the previous-page button in the object of a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerFieldUrl#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerFieldUrl/CS/NumericPagerUrlCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerFieldUrl#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerFieldUrl/VB/NumericPagerUrlVB.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ PreviousPageText { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.PreviousPageText : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置为上一页按钮显示的文本。

span.span: Gets or sets the text that is displayed for the previous-page button.

value.span: 为上一页按钮显示的文本。

span.span: The text that is displayed for the previous-page button.

value.span: 默认值为“…”。

span.span: The default is "…".

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当属性设置为中的文本属性用作图像的替换文字。When the property is set to , the text in the property is used as the alternate text for the image. 在支持工具提示的浏览器，此文本也显示为相应的按钮的工具提示。On browsers that support tooltips, this text is also displayed as a tooltip for the corresponding button. 此属性的值存储在视图状态。The value of this property is stored in view state. 它可以自动保存到的资源文件通过使用设计器工具。It can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 有关详细信息，请参阅和[全球化和本地化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何自定义为上一页按钮中的页导航字段显示的文本控件。The following example shows how to customize the text that is displayed for the previous-page button of the pager field in a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerFieldText#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerFieldText/CS/NumericPagerTextCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerFieldText#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerFieldText/VB/NumericPagerTextVB.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool RenderNonBreakingSpacesBetweenControls { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否将在控件之间呈现非换行空格。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether non-breaking spaces will be rendered between controls.

value.span: 如果在控件之间呈现非换行空格，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if non-breaking spaces will be rendered between controls; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性指定是否不间断空格 (HTML` `字符引用) 将呈现的控件之间对象，例如页面按钮。Use the property to specify whether non-breaking spaces (the HTML ` ` character reference) will be rendered between the controls of the object, such as the page buttons. 如果你需要更好地控制你创建使用级联样式表 (CSS) 类的布局，则可以设置到`false`。If you need more control over the layout that you are creating with cascading style sheet (CSS) classes, you can set to `false`.
